creditline: Gift of Yang and Helen H. Wang
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: figures in multicolored clouds against blue striated background; pair of cranes in top corners; man in blue and red seated on a flying crane at top center; pair of men seated on flying peacock and phoenix-like birds below; pair of figures, each with two attendants, seated on white, green and blue dragons; another pair of figures--one at left seated on a green and red dragon, with three attendants, one at right seated on gold and red dragon, with two attendants; group of figures with round and oval colorful banners in lower corners
title: Daoist Pantheon I
